tool.name: ofile
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir mandatory_noformat && #if "optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_noformat && #end if mkdir mandatory_oneformat && #if "optional_oneformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_oneformat && #end if mkdir mandatory_multformat && #if "optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_multformat && #end if mkdir mandatory_noformat_adv && #if "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_noformat_adv && #end if mkdir mandatory_oneformat_adv && #if "optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_oneformat_adv && #end if mkdir mandatory_multformat_adv && #if "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_multformat_adv && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat && #if "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_noformat && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat && #if "sect_optional_oneformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_oneformat && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat && #if "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_multformat && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv && #if "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat_adv && #if "sect_optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_oneformat_adv && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv && #if "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -mandatory_noformat 'mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_noformat 'optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -mandatory_oneformat 'mandatory_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #if "optional_oneformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_oneformat 'optional_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #end if -mandatory_multformat 'mandatory_multformat/output.${mandatory_multformat_type}' #if "optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_multformat 'optional_multformat/output.${optional_multformat_type}' #end if -mandatory_noformat_adv 'mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_noformat_adv 'optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -mandatory_oneformat_adv 'mandatory_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #if "optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_oneformat_adv 'optional_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #end if -mandatory_multformat_adv 'mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts.mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' #if "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_multformat_adv 'optional_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts.optional_multformat_adv_type}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_noformat 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_noformat 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_oneformat 'test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #if "sect_optional_oneformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_oneformat 'test_section_sect_optional_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_multformat 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_type}' #if "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_multformat 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_type}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_noformat_adv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_noformat_adv 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_oneformat_adv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #if "sect_optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_oneformat_adv 'test_section_sect_optional_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_multformat_adv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' #if "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_multformat_adv 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_adv_type}' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$mandatory_noformat' #if "optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$optional_noformat' #end if && mv 'mandatory_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$mandatory_oneformat' #if "optional_oneformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$optional_oneformat' #end if && mv 'mandatory_multformat/output.${mandatory_multformat_type}' '$mandatory_multformat' #if "optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_multformat/output.${optional_multformat_type}' '$optional_multformat' #end if && mv 'mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$mandatory_noformat_adv' #if "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$optional_noformat_adv' #end if && mv 'mandatory_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$mandatory_oneformat_adv' #if "optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$optional_oneformat_adv' #end if && mv 'mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts.mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' '$mandatory_multformat_adv' #if "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts.optional_multformat_adv_type}' '$optional_multformat_adv' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat' #if "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_optional_noformat' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat' #if "sect_optional_oneformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_oneformat/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$test_section_sect_optional_oneformat' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_type}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat' #if "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_type}' '$test_section_sect_optional_multformat' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv' #if "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_oneformat_adv' #if "sect_optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_oneformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("tsv")}' '$test_section_sect_optional_oneformat_adv' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv' #if "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_adv_type}' '$test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: mandatory_multformat_type
param.label: File type of output mandatory_multformat (output file)

param.name: optional_multformat_type
param.label: File type of output optional_multformat (output file)

param.name: sect_mandatory_multformat_type
param.label: File type of output sect_mandatory_multformat (output file)

param.name: sect_optional_multformat_type
param.label: File type of output sect_optional_multformat (output file)

param.name: sect_mandatory_multformat_adv_type
param.label: File type of output sect_mandatory_multformat_adv (output file)

param.name: sect_optional_multformat_adv_type
param.label: File type of output sect_optional_multformat_adv (output file)

param.name: mandatory_multformat_adv_type
param.label: File type of output mandatory_multformat_adv (output file)

param.name: optional_multformat_adv_type
param.label: File type of output optional_multformat_adv (output file)

data.name: optional_noformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_noformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_noformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_oneformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_oneformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_oneformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_multformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_multformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_multformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_noformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_noformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_oneformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_oneformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_multformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_multformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_noformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_noformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_oneformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_oneformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_oneformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_multformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_multformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_noformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_oneformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_oneformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_oneformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_multformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Output File parameter tests.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/unavailable.html
